<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}

  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of messages linked in one chain (conversation).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>

  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"description":"ID of any message from the conversation","type":"integer"},"loadAll":{"description":"Loads the content of all messages","type":"array","items":{"type":"boolean"}},"markRead":{"description":"Specifies if a conversation will be marked as read or not","type":"array","items":{"type":"boolean"}},"needSanitize":{"description":"Specifies if HTML needs to be prepared for the FCK editor or not","type":"array","items":{"type":"boolean"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
